com.espertech.esper.client.soda

Class DotExpressionItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.espertech.esper.client.soda.DotExpressionItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DotExpressionItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Dot-expresson item is for use in "(inner_expression).dot_expression".

    Each item represent an individual chain item and may either be a method name with method parameters, or a (nested) property name typically with an empty list of parameters or for mapped properties a non-empty list of parameters.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • DotExpressionItem

        public DotExpressionItem()
        Ctor.

      • DotExpressionItem

        public DotExpressionItem(java.lang.String name,
                         java.util.List<Expression> parameters,
                         boolean isProperty)
        Ctor.
        Parameters:
        name - the property (or nested property) or method name
        parameters - are optional and should only be provided if this chain item is a method; Parameters are expressions for parameters to the method (use only for methods and not for properties unless mapped property).
        isProperty - true if this is a nested property name

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns method name or nested property name.

        Sets the method name or nested property name.

        name - method name or nested property name to set

      • getParameters

        public java.util.List<Expression> getParameters()
        Returns method parameters or parameters for mapped properties or empty list if this item represents a simple nested property.
        Returns:
        parameter expressions

      • setParameters

        public void setParameters(java.util.List<Expression> parameters)

        Parameters:
        parameters - expressions to set

      • isProperty

        Gets the value of the property property.

      • setProperty

        public void setProperty(boolean property)
        Set to true if this dot-item is a property name.
        Parameters:
        property - true for property, false for method

      • render

        protected static void render(java.util.List<DotExpressionItem> chain,
                             java.io.StringWriter writer,
                             boolean prefixDot)
        Render to EPL.
        Parameters:
        chain - chain to render
        writer - writer to output to
        prefixDot - indicator whether to prefix with "."
